meanings.sent1: The new book had a meatier plot than the old one.

meanings.sent3: The joke became meatier when the punchline was revealed.
meanings.sent4: Her argument was meatier than his, leaving him speechless.
meanings.sent5: The meatier details of the story made it more interesting.

meanings.sent5: The meatier portion of the meal satisfied his hunger.

meanings.sent1: The meatier proposal seemed more promising to the investors.
